## ServeOptions.address property

Address to bind. - For "tcp", use `host:port` (e.g. `127.0.0.1:0` to select an ephemeral port) - For "unix", provide the socket path (e.g. `/tmp/my.sock`<!-- -->)

**Signature:**

```typescript
address: string
```
